pivot.wtk
Class ListView

java.lang.Object
  pivot.wtk.Component
      pivot.wtk.ListView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstrainedVisual, Visual
public class ListView
extends Component

Component that displays a sequence of items, optionally allowing a user to select or check one or more items.

TODO Add is/setItemChecked(); add events to ListViewItemListener.

TODO Add getCheckMode() method to allow a caller to set NONE, SINGLE, or MULTI; none disables checkboxes, single displays them as radio buttons, and multi displays them as checkboxes (we can already disable selection by setting the select mode to NONE).

TODO Add a showCheckmarks style to ListViewSkin.

Author:
gbrown

setSelectedRanges

public void setSelectedRanges(Sequence<Span> selectedRanges)
Sets the selection to the given span sequence. Any overlapping or connecting spans will be consolidated, and the resulting selection will be sorted in ascending order.

Parameters:
selectedRanges -
